level.text: Notice required in section 506(a)(2) of the Act and ยง 6906.1(b) of this section shall be printed in not less than twelve (12) point type in both English and Spanish and, at a minimum, include the following:
The identity of the receiver and his or her address and telephone number;
The anticipated duration of the receivership; and.
The statement that no tenant is required to move as a result of the receivership.
